_sText:
This map is amazing. Not just because of it's beautiful ambiance, smooth walls, or glowing boxes, but because it has a shitload (it's an imperial unit) of brushes. This map uses fully 86% of Hammer's brush capacity. Let me tell you why: because it knows you want it. This map knows you've been longing to touch and caress its smooth curves, to brush your lips on its glowing stripes, and to maybe, just maybe, give it a handjob in the back room of a 7-11.

Other than the immense sexual fantasy you just had, the map has all the typical stuff. 
Built for gameplay, optimized for shitty computers, and dressed up all fancy just for you.

Let me know what you think. It's not hard, just type it in the little box down there. I'll get back to you with some nudie pics and a bottle of lotion.

UNTIL I COME AGAIN!

-bclose
